short_summary: Establishment of a supply arrangement for paper and cardboardr disposal in Newfoundland and Labrador and in Nova Scotia for one 、year period followed by an automatic single one (1)-year renewal.
description: This specification solicitation is to establish contract(s) with five (5 ) option periods for scheduled and as needed paper and cardboard recycling services for nine (9) Service Canada Centres in Newfoundland and in one (1) Service center Free-to-use in Hector suites.
